segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, the woman is drying dishes with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the faucet gushing water over the sink's rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling everywhere, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her foot in it, but keeps on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is climbing a stool to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are all spread out, looking ready to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand up, begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sneaky little operation they're pulling off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a pretty garden, all calm and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the mom hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end with someone slipping or falling hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look tempting, though; I get why they're doing it.
segments.speaker: PAR
